title: Support Vector Machine in R | SVM Algorithm Example | Data Science With R Tutorial | Simplilearn
excerpt: This Support Vector Machine in R tutorial video will help you understand what is Machine Learning, what is classification, what is Support Vector Machine (SVM), what is SVM kernel and you will also see a use case in which we will classify horses and mules from a given data set using SVM algorithm.
